testcase.classname: Verify the functionality add to cart and payments for test store application
testcase.name: Validate the product details after checkout on payments page
testcase.system-out: Given Lunch the browser and navigate to automation test store application...passed And Click on login or register button.......................................passed And user enters username "automation312" and userpassword "XXXXXXXXX" on login account screen.passed And Click on login button...................................................passed When User add product to the cart and click on checkout.....................passed Then Validate product "Shaving cream" details on payments page..............passed And User logout the test store application..................................passed
